content: Is it mandatory to implement the FHIR server to compliant with Da Vinci PDex Plan-Net implementation? Or Any interoperability IG implementation should have a FHIR server?

@Bapi Behera - don't understand the questions.
I think for the 2nd question my take would be: no one cares about the underlying technology supporting your API, as long as it conforms with the CapStmt.
